name: GrandNarr!
description:
*The project is still under development, and the information will be continuously updated and more comprehensive.
GrandNarr! is an action sandbox game with a medieval low magic background. Collect resources in the game world, make everything that enhances your strength, attack and occupy enemy bases on large maps. Then strengthen the base of the occupation and guard against the enemy's counterattack. GrandNarr! provides a highly real-time and dynamic world environment. Players can use their own ideas to achieve the goal of full-screen mastery with free and rich means.

Combat system


GrandNarr! is an action game. When fighting, it mainly considers the enemy's weapons, armor and physical state. Always keep well equipped and pay attention to your energy. Otherwise, it will be very disadvantageous to fight naked against the enemy. If the physical strength is poor, it will easily be overthrown by the enemy and fall into a disadvantage.

Rich AI behavior


The interaction with npc in the game is very unique. Players don't need to face a lot of text menus and white water plots. Everything depends on your own behavior! If you make bad things, the villagers will not like you. If you are good to them, they will help you fight! Trading, hiring, cooperating, and rescuing, all in a simple interactive system - even the enemy, they have their seven passions, you want to have a relationship with them is no problem! They will respond reasonably to what you are doing, and there will be many unexpected things happening. Try it out!

Production synthesis and a small amount of survival elements


In the game,all weaponry items are made from materials, and the items are inextricably linked. Players can explore rich usages and produce unexpected results to help with tactical implementation. The survival factor in the game is in a secondary position, and the player needs to pay attention to his physical condition for a period of time, but he does not need to be oppressed from time to time.

Argument

The overall goal of the game is to master the whole picture! By annihilating and occupying all enemy positions, you will be able to usher in the final victory. There are different types of locations, which determine the available items and how to fight. Occupy your desired location according to your own preferences!
